verses.verse: <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is there <S%H3426>yet<s%> any who is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> that I may <S%H6213>show<s%> him <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>'s sake?"

There was of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6717>Ziba,<s%> and they <S%H7121>called<s%> him to <S%H1732>David;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6717>him,<s%> "Are you Ziba?" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your servant is <S%H5650>he.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is there <S%H657>not<s%> yet <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> that I may <S%H6213>show<s%> the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6717>him?<s%>" Ziba <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3083>"Jonathan<s%> has yet a <S%H1121>son,<s%> who is <S%H5223>lame<s%> of his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H375>him,<s%> "Where is <S%H6717>he?<s%>" Ziba <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H1004>"Behold,<s%> he is in the house of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel,<s%> in Lo <S%H3810>Debar.<s%>"

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> him out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel,<s%> from Lo <S%H3810>Debar.<s%>

<S%H4648>Mephibosheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and showed <S%H7812>respect.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4648>"Mephibosheth.<s%>" He <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H5650>"Behold,<s%> your servant!"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3372>him,<s%> "Don't be afraid of <S%H6213>him;<s%> for I will surely <S%H6213>show<s%> you <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H7725>sake,<s%> and will restore to you all the <S%H7704>land<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%> You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>"
He <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H559>down,<s%> and said, "What is your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that you should <S%H6437>look<s%> on such a <S%H4191>dead<s%> dog as I <S%H3611>am?<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H6717>Ziba,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H5288>servant,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1961>him,<s%> "All that pertained to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and to all his <S%H1004>house<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son.<s%>

You shall <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H1121>him,<s%> you, and your sons, and your <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H113>harvest,<s%> that your master's <S%H1121>son<s%> may have <S%H3899>bread<s%> to <S%H398>eat:<s%> but <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> your <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> at my <S%H7979>table.<s%>" Now <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> had <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

Then <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "According to all that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commands<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> so your shall <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6213>do.<s%>" So <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> at the <S%H7979>king<s%>'s table, like <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

<S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> had a <S%H6996>young<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4316>Mica.<s%> All that <S%H4186>lived<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> were <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H4648>Mephibosheth.<s%>

So <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> for he <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> at the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7979>table.<s%> He was <S%H6455>lame<s%> in <S%H8147>both<s%> his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
